The equiangular convex hexagon $ ABCDEF$ has $ AB = 1$, $ BC = 4$, $ CD = 2$, and $ DE = 4$. The area of the hexagon is\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{15}{2}\sqrt{3}\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 9\sqrt{3}\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 16\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{39}{4}\sqrt{3}\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ \frac{43}{4}\sqrt{3}$
